entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
